titleStmt.title: The Iesuites banner Displaying their original and successe: their vow and othe: their hypocrisie and superstition: their doctrine and positions: with a confutation of a late pamphlet secretly imprinted and entituled: A briefe censure vpon two bookes written in answeare to M. Campions offer of disputation. &c. Compiled by Meredith Hanmer M. of Arte, and student in diuinity.
titleStmt.author: Hanmer, Meredith, 1543-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Dawson and Richard Vernon, and are to be solde in Paules Churchyard at the Brazen Serpent,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Parsons, Robert. A brief censure uppon two bookes written in answere to M. Edmonde Campions offer of disputation.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Paules Churchyard at the Brazen Serpent
